item.description:
I know I'm going out of order

And I know I'm going "off schedule"

But...

 

August's brunch will be at Bittersweet Farm in Westport.

The restaurant only offers a public brunch on the 1st Sunday of each month so we will attend on August 7 at 11:00 am.

This is a brunch buffet for $19 per person

http://www.lafrancehospitality.com/bittersweet-farm/

Every first Sunday of the month, relax and enjoy the Grand Brunch Buffet from 10:30 a.m. to 1:30 p.m. with live acoustic music. Choose from made-to-order omelets and waffles, salads, pasta and sauté stations to poached salmon, carved meats, fresh fruit, assorted pastries and more.

I'll call them this week and make a reservation for us.

I hope you can be there.

PS:  I'll post July's brunch soon.
item.name: August Brunch - Bittersweet Farm in Westport
